title: ART OF SCHIELE
description: Ananas Media is a creative media agency specializing in video production, photography, and graphic design services. The website is designed to showcase their work effectively. It features interactions to enhance user engagement, custom video players and CMS integration.

title: DATA VIBES
description: Art meets data visualization in this interactive experience powered by WebGL and creative programming.

title: STORY SCROLL
description: A storytelling interface with vertical parallax, subtle motion graphics, and strong typographic rhythm.
